c.DAO

Interface JoinedTablesDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JoinedTablesDBDAO

    public interface JoinedTablesDAO

    Interface that allows the application to perform all essential methods that involve communication with the database join tables.

    The join tables are Company_Coupon and Customer_Couponb. The communication channels for this interface are all the JavaBeans.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add new row for Company_Coupon table.
      void createCustomer_Coupon(Customer customer, Coupon coupon)
      Add new row for Customer_Coupon table.
      boolean isThereCompanyCoupon(long compID, long couponID)
      Check if a specific company has a specific coupon.
      boolean isThereCustomerCoupon(long custID, long couponID)
      Check if a specific customer has a specific coupon.
      void RemoveCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Remove coupon from both Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon tables.
      void RemoveCustomer_Coupon(Customer customer, Coupon coupon)
      Remove specific row in Customer_Coupon table of CouponDB database
      void RemoveCustomer(Customer customer)
      Remove customer and all of its coupon purchase history from Customer_Coupon table.

    • Method Detail

      • createCompany_Coupon

        void createCompany_Coupon(Company company,
                          Coupon coupon)
                   throws DAOException
        Add new row for Company_Coupon table.
        Parameters:
        company - The company for the row.
        coupon - The coupon for the row.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If company or coupon doesn't exist, or connection lost.

      • createCustomer_Coupon

        void createCustomer_Coupon(Customer customer,
                           Coupon coupon)
                    throws DAOException
        Add new row for Customer_Coupon table.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer for the row.
        coupon - The coupon for the row.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If customer or coupon doesn't exist, or connection lost.

      • RemoveCoupon

        void RemoveCoupon(Coupon coupon)
           throws DAOException
        Remove coupon from both Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon tables.
        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon to remove.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If coupon doesn't exist, or connection lost.

      • RemoveCustomer_Coupon

        void RemoveCustomer_Coupon(Customer customer,
                           Coupon coupon)
                    throws DAOException
        Remove specific row in Customer_Coupon table of CouponDB database
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer with the ID to search for.
        coupon - The coupon with the ID to search for.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If customer or coupon doesn't exist, or connection lost.

      • RemoveCustomer

        void RemoveCustomer(Customer customer)
             throws DAOException
        Remove customer and all of its coupon purchase history from Customer_Coupon table. This is done according to the database information and regardless to the coupon collection of the given customer object.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer to remove.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If customer doesn't exist, or connection lost.

      • isThereCompanyCoupon

        boolean isThereCompanyCoupon(long compID,
                             long couponID)
                      throws DAOException
        Check if a specific company has a specific coupon.
        Parameters:
        compID - The company ID.
        couponID - The coupon ID.
        Returns:
        True - if correct.
        False - if not.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with database failed.

      • isThereCustomerCoupon

        boolean isThereCustomerCoupon(long custID,
                              long couponID)
                       throws DAOException
        Check if a specific customer has a specific coupon.
        Parameters:
        custID - The customer ID.
        couponID - The coupon ID.
        Returns:
        True - if correct.
        False - if not.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with database failed.
